long: Meaning: to "exist"; used in a great variety of applications (especially in connection with other words).  Usage: be, become,   behold,   came (to pass),   cease,   cleave,   consider,   do,   give,   have,   judge,   keep,   labour,   mingle (self),   put,   see,   seek,   set,   slay,   take heed, tremble,   walk,   would.  Source: (Aramaic) or "הָוָה"; (Aramaic), corresponding to "H1933";
